title: The best Decathlon deals | Latest offers on bikes, turbo trainers, jerseys, bib shorts and more
content:
We’ve done a deep dive into Decathlon’s sale to bring you the best deals on new clothes, kit and accessories.

From wind-breaking gilets to merino wool jerseys, there’s plenty of gear to get your hands on.

If you’re looking for more, you can check out Decathlon’s sale page in full.

Best Decathlon deals

Triban RC 500 Disc Brake road bike – £649.99 £599.99

Dave Caudery / Our Media

The Triban RC 500 Disc Brake road bike scored an impressive 4.5 stars when we tested it last year.

Our tester appreciated the bike’s brakes, fittings for accessories and versatility, saying it “offers you a huge amount of bike for quite a modest amount of cash.”

In the Decathlon sale, it offers even better value for money with 7 per cent off.

Latest deals

Elite Direto X – £699.99 £599.99

The Direto X smart trainer features a built-in power meter, with a claimed accuracy of 1.5 per cent. It can simulate climbs of 18 per cent, with a max power output of 2,100 watts.

Latest deals

Elite Direto Interactive – £599.99 £499.99

The Elite Direto Interactive comes with a built-in sensor which measures power output with a claimed accuracy of 2 per cent. It can simulate climbs of up to 14 per cent, with a max power output of 1,400 watts.

The trainer comes with access to software and app with a pedalling analysis option, as well as Zwift and Bluetooth.

The noise level is reportedly quiet in use and it’s available at a saving of 16 per cent.

Latest deals

Hutchinson Kraken mountain bike tyres twin pack – £44.99 £39.99

Decathlon

The Hutchinson Kraken twin pack comes with a saving of 11 per cent.

The 29n mountain bike tyres are 2.3in wide and are a good budget option if you’re looking to upgrade your stock rubber, though be warned they’re not tubeless compatible.

Latest deals

Ergon SR Road Comp Men’s bike saddle – £89.99 £59.99

Decathlon

The Ergon SR Road Comp Men’s bike saddle is currently in the Decathlon sale with 33 per cent off.

The road bike saddle is said to have an ergonomically designed shape with a relief channel, as well as OrthoCell inlays to help distribute weight.

Latest deals

Triban RC100 Men’s Short-Sleeved Summer Jersey – £19.99 £17.99

This men’s cycling jersey uses a moisture-wicking material, which aims to keep your skin dry.

There’s a full-length zip for ventilation and pockets: one zipped for your valuables and two for energy gels or bars.

Latest deals

Triban GRVL900 Men’s Merino Short-Sleeved Jersey – £49.99 £39.99

This jersey features a design similar to the short sleeve summer jersey above but includes a merino wool fabric, which aims to offer enhanced breathability.

The material is also said to provide enhanced stretch and comfort. There’s a large back pocket for storage and a zipped pocket for valuables.

Latest deals

Triban RC500 Men’s Mid-Season Long-Sleeved Jersey – £39.99 £34.99

This option from Triban is for when the weather reaches an awkward middle phase: too cold for a summer jersey but too hot for a winter jacket.

The jacket features a fleece lining and windproof fabric for protection, but breathable fabric across the back and sleeves.

There’s a full-length zip for some added ventilation, three back pockets and a zipped chest pocket.

Latest deals

Van Rysel Men’s Hi-Viz Jacket – £29.99 £24.99

The Van Rysel cycling gilet is available with a saving of 16 per cent.

The front features a water and windproof material, while the back is made from a mesh fabric to help with breathability.

The fabric features a neon yellow colour for increased visibility, with reflective patches for riding in low light.

Latest deals

Triban RC100 Bib Shorts – £29.99 £24.99

In our test of the best bib shorts for men, these cycling shorts earned an impressive four and a half stars.

It scored well in part due to the fit, which we thought was supportive but not overly compressive.

We also liked the mesh upper and air channels which keep you cool, as well as the supportive pad.

Latest deals

Women’s Windproof Cycling Gilet – £24.99 £19.99

Another option for when the weather shifts, this women’s gilet is designed to protect you from wind and provide a layer of thermal protection.

The gilet uses a fabric which is said to be ultra-lightweight, meaning it should be compact enough to fit into your pocket.
